t7:stop

Full name:

com.googlecode.t7mp:maven-t7-plugin:0.9.9-SNAPSHOT:stop

Description:

This Mojo uses the plugin context to get a reference to shutdown.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Parameters

(no parameters)
